originalText: Setting clear objectives requires being Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, and Time-bound to ensure success in project management and personal development goals.
Mindfulness practices help us find inner calm through being Present, Embracing acceptance, Acknowledging thoughts without judgment, Cultivating compassion, and Establishing daily routines.
Effective studying involves Listening actively, Engaging with material, Asking questions, Reviewing regularly, and taking detailed Notes to retain information better.
